short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show metadata for links' previews on Twitter/X.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Show metadata for new links' previews on Twitter/X!

This extension aims to return rich metadata display for new embed format of external links on Twitter/X.

Simple to use: install and you are ready to go!
No setup needed!
Doesn't clutter timeline: descriptions are trimmed to 128 characters.
Feels like home.
